title: Accor Luxury in the Heart of Mysuru with Rooftop Pool & Daily Dining
description:
Contemporary comfort meets the luxury synonymous with the world-renowned Accor group at Grand Mercure Mysore, located in the heart of Mysuru. Just minutes away from all the major attractions of this heritage city, this five-star hotel is perfect for families or couples seeking relaxation. Your escape includes daily breakfast for two, one dinner for two, one mocktail each once during the stay, and a 20% discount on food and drinks.

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged eight years and under) stay free on existing bedding with daily breakfast.
offer_address: 2203, Nelson Mandela Circle, 60, Sayyaji Rao Rd, Bamboo Bazar, Shivarampet, Mysuru, Karnataka 570021

title: Radisson Mysuru Luxury with Gourmet Dining & Daily Cocktails
description:
Contemporary comfort meets the timeless luxury synonymous with the world-renowned Radisson group at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mysore. Just a 15-minute drive from Mysuru Airport and less than an hour from the major attractions of this heritage city, the hotel is perfect for families wanting to enjoy a quick vacation or couples seeking relaxation. Lakshmikantha Swamy Temple and Sri Bhavani Shankar Eshwara Temple sit on the hotel's doorstep, while Mysore Palace, Brindavan Gardens and Sri Chamarajendra Zoo are just a short drive away. 

After a busy day exploring the sights, relax with an invigorating swim in the hotel's outdoor pool, a visit to the well-equipped fitness centre, or a pampering session at the onsite spa.
location_description: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mysore
offer_address: 345/A, near Infosys Campus, Hebbal Industrial Estate, Hebbal Industrial Area, Mysuru, Karnataka 570016
